name: base
author: ar1m4k3y
description: Monorepo with React client and NestJS API

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace client dev" "yarn workspace api start:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace client build" "yarn workspace api build"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace client preview" "yarn workspace api start:prod"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn workspace client test" "yarn workspace api test"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "yarn workspace client test:coverage" "yarn workspace api test:cov"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "yarn workspace client test:watch" "yarn workspace api test:watch"
scripts.lint: concurrently "yarn workspace client lint" "yarn workspace api lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "yarn workspace client lint:fix" "yarn workspace api lint:fix"
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace client clean" "yarn workspace api clean"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently "yarn workspace client typecheck" "yarn workspace api typecheck"
